sourcesContent: import React from "react"; const EditabledRow = ({ editFormData, handleEditFormChange, handleCancelButtonClick }) => { return ( ) } export default EditabledRow;

import React, {Fragment} from "react"; import DateTimePicker from 'react-datetime-picker/dist/entry.nostyle'; import 'react-calendar/dist/Calendar.css'; import 'react-time-picker/dist/TimePicker.css' import 'react-datetime-picker/dist/DateTimePicker.css' import 'react-clock/dist/Clock.css' function formatAppDate(dateTimeString){ const dateTime = new Date(dateTimeString) dateTime.toLocaleString('en-US', { hour: 'numeric', hour12: true }) return( dateTime.getFullYear() + "/" + ("0" + (dateTime.getMonth()+1)).slice(-2) + "/" + ("0" + dateTime.getDate()).slice(-2) + " " + ("0" + dateTime.getHours()).slice(-2) + ":" + ("0" + dateTime.getMinutes()).slice(-2) + ":" + ("0" + dateTime.getSeconds()).slice(-2) ) } const EditableRow = ({editFormData, handleCancelButtonClick, handleTimeInChange, handleTimeOutChange }) => { return ( {editFormData.volunteer_firstname} {editFormData.volunteer_lastname} {formatAppDate(editFormData.regdatetime)} ) } export default EditableRow;
